# Tom Seidel â€“ Java Freelancer & Cloud-Native Specialist

> Freelance Java consultant with 20+ years of experience in cloud-native, microservices, and DevOps. Based in Germany, remote-first.

Tom Seidel is a freelance consultant specializing in Java development, cloud-native architectures, and DevOps. He supports projects end-to-end: from initial concept and architecture to production-ready implementation. His focus areas include migrating monolithic systems to scalable microservice architectures and launching new Java-based cloud projects.

## Contact

- Email: tom.seidel@remus-software.org
- LinkedIn: [linkedin.com/in/tomseidel](https://linkedin.com/in/tomseidel)
- GitHub: [github.com/tmseidel](https://github.com/tmseidel)

- [Home](https://tomseidel.com/): Overview, about, tech stack, and availability
- [Projects](https://tomseidel.com/projects/): A curated selection of 30+ project references across automotive, medical technology, telecommunications, and more
- [Articles](https://tomseidel.com/articles/): Technical articles on Java, cloud-native architecture, DevOps, and software engineering

## Skills & Technologies

Languages: Java, Kotlin, Bash, Python, TypeScript
Frameworks: Spring Boot, Micronaut, OSGi, React
Cloud Platforms: AWS, Azure, OVH, Hetzner
DevOps: Docker, Kubernetes, Helm, Terraform, Maven, Ansible
CI/CD: GitHub Actions, Jenkins, GitLab CI
Tools & Protocols: Git, REST, gRPC, MQTT, WebSockets, oAuth2

## Availability

Open for freelance and contract work. Remote-first, based in Germany (CET/CEST timezone). Prefers remote work but open to on-site at regular intervals.
